name: GamerLink - LFG, Clans & Chat for Gamers!
description: GamerLink: LFG, Clans and Chat for Gamers! Find Teammates and friends across all the most popular games and platforms!  Never game alone again with GamerLink. Discover gamers who play the way you do! Connect with like-minded gamers through our Clan and LFG systems and match on the areas that matter most: Play-style, Communication and Skill. Search for players who share your goals to get the most out of your play-time. We know you only have so many hours to game, so why not make the most of those hours by playing with a highly compatible squad?  GamerLink is truly Universal. We support over 200 titles across every major platform!  Whether you are gaming on PC or console, Xbox or Playstation, we have the games you are playing and large communities of active players. Finding a team, squad or fireteam for your favourite game has never been easier.  Whether you are looking for that Victory Royale, Chicken Dinner, grinding out competitive, ranking up or climbing the ladder, we have gamers looking to play. If you are looking for something less stressful, we have plenty of players ready to kick back, relax and enjoy some casual games.  Our Clan and group chat features give you the tools to plan out your next gaming session and discover new, awesome communities to join. Finding a gaming clan has never been easier and our LFG system allows you to narrow your focus and find exactly the right teammates to compliment your play-style.  GamerLink is still in the beta phase of development.  As a tester/user, your feedback is extremely valuable and will greatly help us improve your experience on GamerLink. Please do submit any questions, concerns or feedback to support@gamerlink.gg!  GAMERS UNITE!
